title: 是指令有问题还是我这有问题？
txt_content:
之前在网上找到了一个教程，教人怎么去再原版做出来彩色的东西，我试了，用了这个指令
/give @p sign 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{Text2:"{\"text\":\"Click\",\"color\":\"blue\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/setblock ~ ~ ~ command_block 2 replace {Command:\\\" /give @p 4135 1 0 {ench:[{id:16,lvl:10},{id:17,lvl:10},{id:18,lvl:3},{id:19,lvl:10},{id:20,lvl:10},{id:21,lvl:32767},{id:22,lvl:32767}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1000000000000000000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:攻击威力附加},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:0.2,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:速度加成}],Ubreakable:1},display:{Name:\\\"\u00a74\u00a7lGae blog\\\",Lore:[\\\"\u00a79\u00a7l你真牛逼\\\",\\\"\u00a79哈哈哈哈\\\"]}\\\"}\"}}"}}
然后得到一个告示牌，他说放置告示牌并右键，就可以在原地放置一个命令方块替换告示牌
我试了怎么不信噶 
求解qwq

replies.author: WarbleOrigin
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 WO! 于 2018-6-28 15:28 编辑 
1914166403 发表于 2018-6-28 14:20
e 原来的指令貌似就有问题 我发出来 求帮我改改 /give @p 4135 1 0 {ench:[{id:16,lvl:10},{id:17,lvl:10}, ...
帮你改好了：/give WO_LGQ minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {ench:[{id:16,lvl:10},{id:17,lvl:10},{id:18,lvl:3},{id:19,lvl:10},{id:20,lvl:10},{id:21,lvl:32767},{id:22,lvl:32767}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1000000000000000000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:"攻击威力附加"},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:0.2,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:"速度加成"}],Unbreakable:1,display:{Name:"4lGae blog",Lore:["你真牛逼","哈哈哈哈"]}}

你这段指令有很多错误啊...
首先minecraft中并没有ID为4135的物品，更何况指令早已弃用数字ID，其次指令中出现中文是要加引号的，然后Unbreakable拼写错误，并列的指令也不需要加花括号，另外mc无法打出§，需要通过其他方法实现彩色字体
mc已禁用了样式代码（§）,更改文字颜色参考2b教程：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-443181-1-1.html你网上找来的这段指令错误太多了...
我发现我原来的指令就是错的............

e 原来的指令貌似就有问题 我发出来 求帮我改改 /give @p 4135 1 0 {ench:[{id:16,lvl:10},{id:17,lvl:10},{id:18,lvl:3},{id:19,lvl:10},{id:20,lvl:10},{id:21,lvl:32767},{id:22,lvl:32767}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1000000000000000000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:攻击威力附加},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:0.2,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:速度加成}],Ubreakable:1},display:{Name:"§4§lGae blog",Lore:["§9§l你真牛逼","§9哈哈哈哈"]}

replies.author: 极光战神伍
replies.txt_content:
1.7哪有牌子json啊...
2b那个帖子也是针对1.8的啊...
单纯的指令错误就一堆了，顺手帮改了。

/give @p 4135 1 0 {ench:[{id:16,lvl:10},{id:17,lvl:10},{id:18,lvl:3},{id:19,lvl:10},{id:20,lvl:10},{id:21,lvl:32767},{id:22,lvl:32767}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1000000000000000000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:攻击威力附加},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:0.2,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:速度加成}],Ubreakable:1},display:{Name:"§4§lGae blog",Lore:["§9§l你真牛逼","§9哈哈哈哈"]}

/give @p 4135 1 0 {ench:[{id:16,lvl:10},{id:17,lvl:10},{id:18,lvl:3},{id:19,lvl:10},{id:20,lvl:10},{id:21,lvl:32767},{id:22,lvl:32767}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1000000000000000000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:attackdamage},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:0.2,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:speed}],Unbreakable:1b,display:{Name:"§4§lGae blog",Lore:["§9§l你真牛逼","§9哈哈哈哈"]}}
第一条错的，第二条对的，红色有误的。

1.7还是背包编辑器存在的时代，没必要这么麻烦的。
